pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Theresa May, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom. 

The prime ministers discussed the opportunity for the G7 to show leadership on creating economic growth and reducing income inequality. They also spoke of their commitment to education for girls and women in crisis and conflict-affected situations, and to advance progress on the oceans and environment agenda. They emphasized the importance of continued collaboration by G7 leaders on global security and trade issues.  

Prime Minister Trudeau and Prime Minister May also discussed Canada-United Kingdom bilateral issues, including commercial relations.

The Prime ministers agreed to keep in contact as the G7 Leadersâ€™ Summit in Charlevoix draws closer.
